评论详情: My measurements are 42.5" bust, 35.9" waist and 47.8" hips, and I wear 34" inseam jeans (the long sizes for most brands). I purchased the XL and this set fit PERFECTLY. My arms are usually too long for most long-sleeved shirts, but these sleeves are long enough that I can comfortably slip my thumbs in the thumb holes and it doesn't feel like I'm pulling them. The top is relaxed fit (not tight at all, fits like a sweatshirt should) and cropped and stops right at the waist of the pants, so no midriff shows unless I reach up or over my head, and even then, it doesn't come up high enough to see my bra. The neck isn't tight. The pants come up just over my belly button at my natural waist and are super flattering. The waist band is wide and not tight, so there's no muffin top. It's really slimming, actually. The legs come all the way down to the bottom of my ankle bone, where the pants cinch, which is AMAZING because I have long legs and was concerned about them not being long enough. I have very large hips (see above), butt, legs (28.2" thigh circumference) and ankles (10.1" ankle circumference) and these are not tight. They fit perfectly. So perfectly that I am a little afraid to dry them. I will probably wash on cold and dry on gentle/not hot to prevent shrinking. I plan to wear these as warm-up sweats over my leggings to run outdoors in the winter before my indoor boxing sessions.

I was so surprised by this sweatsuit outfit because my husband actually picked it out for it. It is so cute! It is so soft and fuzzy. The little detailing of the slightly cropped but still long enough hoodie hits at the perfect line. The pants are scrunched at the bottom and they have a little baggy fit so you can lay back and be chill the whole day. No one likes super tight sweats anyways. This suit is a must buy and you will NOT be disappointed!

I got this originally for a Halloween costume but love it so much I wear it all the time. Super thick high quality material. Love the cropped hoodie. The sweatpants do run a little small and don’t have much give but overall would recommend.

评论概述: great quality, 10/10, great nike or lulu dupe
评论详情: didn’t think this would be as high quality or cozy as it was, but this is the best lounge set i’ve ever bought. better than my nike set even. very soft and warm. i’m 5’3 115lbs and i got a medium because i don’t like my clothes to be tight, fits perfectly for me

Was a little hesitant to buy because there were no reviews. The set is good quality and comfortable. However, it runs pretty small. I’m a true medium (5’8, 135 lbs) and this fit like a tight small in the waistband. It stretches a lot, but then squeezes you back in. The top is cropped so keep that in mind. I got the bean green color and it was a little lighter / more vibrant than I was expecting. It was pretty, but I ended up not liking the color (because of personal taste, not the seller). I’m 5’8 and the pants hit perfectly at my ankles. They’re also high wasted and your mid section should be covered with the cropped hoodie if you wear them where they are intended. Ultimately, I am returning, but it’s a good choice if you get the sizing right.

A Nike dupe at a fraction of the price!!! The quality is fantastic. The texture, thickness…such great quality!! I’m usually medium but ordered up for coziness and glad I did. I will definitely order more colors! I’m 5’7/135 lbs and went with a large. I wish I could’ve had the opportunity to mix sizes (an XL top and Large bottoms) but it’s still such a great set!!
I am a curvy girl and this made me look like the Big Marshmellow Man. I returned it. It was not flattering - fit was not good. It was soft if you want me to say something positive. I returned it.

I wear this around the house but it’s cute enough to wear anywhere! The cropped hoodie hits right at the waist which I love and it’s soft and cozy too. Don’t get attached to the silver ‘sheaths’ over the ends of the laces, they fall off immediately and it really doesn’t matter at all. Still cute💜 fabulous price, great value. Size up for a modern, baggier fit

Bought a small and medium for my nieces for something comfortable to wear on their visit to their mother’s during Christmas.  They love them so soft and comfortable.  Half cotton. They are slim and petite so I’d say they run a bit small.  Also read that in reviews prior to purchasing. Perfect for the occasion and price.  Thank you!
I'm typically a medium but I was looking for something a little comfier so I got a large. I got the black suit, I adore it and I wish there were more colors to choose from. I will be buying more
3 of the 4 sliver caps fell off before I even left my house, other than that it’s a great quality sweatsuit. Very warm and comfortable. I will definitely purchase other colors!

I wore this on a road trip. This was perfect because it was comfortable enough to be sitting in a car for 8+ hours, but also chic enough to walk into any gas station/coffeeshop/roadside attraction and not look like I've been on an 8+ hour car ride.
I’ve returned this outfit because it was too large and too expensive to keep the quality was not like I wasn’t expecting.

I bought these for a trip to Scotland. I wanted a good "airplane" set for the long flight that also kept me warm. The plane gets a little too frigid for my liking. The sweatshirt is cropped. It covered my belly, but when I moved my arms, exposed my stomach. It was exactly what I was looking for, but if that style isn't for you, I'd love on to another set. The material is thick. It didn't shrink after washing. I loved it so much I ended up washing it during my trip just so I could wear it again. I got a medium and I'm 5'3 and around 140lbs. I also wore the sweatshirt out with leggings when the weather got a little warmer. Super cute. Highly recommend.
Super cute and comfy however do not put this set in the dryer it will shrink. Wash in cold water and air dry or dry on very low heat
Fit great but is already piling after the wash I gave it before I ever wore it. Lame. Super soft.
This set is not soft nor comfortable. Otherwise it’s ok.
If you're curvy, you may want to size up of you want a looser fit for the bottoms. Mostly if you have thick thighs like me. I really liked the material. It's thick and will keep you warm

I bought a blue color M last winter and wore it so well that I bought it again in a different color, size S, this time Good quality, light weight, warm and reasonable price  I’m 5“5 164cm 120Lb perfect for S size
When i got it don't look good as a photo
waistband was pretty tight. I'm 5'6", 127lbs. I ordered a med and it still squeezed my belly but I love it anyway bc it's so warm!

I have been shopping online & in person for 6m to find the perfect set like - was hesitant bc some reviews said thin , but this was not my experience . The thickest quality I can find anywhere , like 3x thicker than HM! This is perfect for a highwaist cute look that doesn’t look like pjs . The top is a crop hoodie but not so short it shows belly just short enough that it’s not covering your butt! For ref im 5’ 4” and 160lb and ordered an XL so it had a baggy fit and is the perfect Kim k doupe

评论概述: Comfy and cute, color is off though
评论详情: I got this in 'rust' and the color is more peachy than rust. It's lighter than in the picture for sure. Still cute and comfy though.

I bought these for my teen daughter for Christmas. We measured her and ordered based on the sizing chart provided. They fit perfect! The set is loose fitting but the “crop” hoodie is the perfect length to make it so you do t look swallowed in fabric. Three months later and I have washed this set on a weekly basis and I both pieces have held up remarkably well. They are made very well. The stitching is reinforced in places that cheaper clothes aren’t and the fabric is still soft. Worth the money bc it will last long!

I didn’t want mine too much of a crop so I went with a large. Loved it so much bought two more colors.  The Rust and Gray Green doesn’t really match in the pictures which is disappointing. The fact it’s brighter washes out me out. Doesn’t go well with my skin tone.
Runs a bit small. The material is nice and thick though. I may cut the pockets out, they’re really clunky in the front.
Super cute and comfy.  The only issue after just a few washing, the top shrank a little.  Definitely, must be air dried.
I love thid set. The color I got was definately brown, not rust. Still, they are super cute and hoodie is perfect! I am usually medium but i love large because it doesnt bother my waist.
The most comfy, cute, and warm set ever! This is how all hoodies and sweats should fit. Buy it or you’ve failed. Thank me later.
Cute but very bulky. Might be better a size larger
Quality sucks after one wash. I air dried and it still shrunk. It’s comfortable but not worth it once washed.
Really nice, thick material! The only con is that it does run a little bit small. I am typically a medium and got a large.

Purchased this for my 14 year old for spirit week, they had a Barbie day, it fit her perfectly. I didn't think she would wear it again after the event passed but she still wears it. The color is true to the picture and the quality is also great as well. I would purchase again.

If you're going for warmth and comfort, this set does the job. If you're looking for something form-flattering, look elsewhere 😉.  The only issue is that it comes pretty wrinkled. I had to iron mine out before this picture was taken. 5'7", 163lbs, and I'm wearing a size Large.

I read the reviews & they were misleading. I’m 5’9 and sized up just in case I needed a little extra material to work with & it didn’t help…the pants are flooding & the hoodie is short in a weird way. The whole sweatsuit looks like I washed it in hot water & dried it on high heat. It looks like my clothes shrunk. Nice color tho. Returning immediately. And I needed this for a trip tomorrow. Off to the mall I go :(
I have never had a sweatshirt and pants that are so well made and thick.  So worth the money.  The color is spot on.  I got the brown.
This matching sweatsuit is the perfect comfy outfit for any occasion. The material is so soft and is great quality. It’s a must have in your wardrobe!
The quality is really good and it fits really well.  Love this color too.  I’m 5’7, 185 lbs, and wearing a size large.  The length was perfect for me.
A little surprised by how well made this set is. Thick, quality material that fits well. I am 5'4, 155 pounds and a size large fit perfectly.

I ordered the navy blue and LOVE!! This is a thick quality sweatsuit. Made well and looks high end. I am 5’5 with a big booty and hips with a smaller waist. I ordered the XL and it fit  perfectly. Not too tight on my butt as some had mentioned. Definitely worth the price!!!
Recently post partum and I love monochromatic outfits. This fit well and definitely keeps me warm!

The fleece is a great material! It’s vey warm and thick. Wanted a sweatsuit that’s casual but can wear out and this is perfect. Originally ordered a L, was more oversized than wanted, and the M fits very well!

评论概述: The pant waist is very snug
评论详情: It’s warm and comfortable, aside from the pant waist being very snug.. And the color looks pink to me.
Runs a little small so size up if that’s what you need. I absolutely love this sweatsuit. Very comfortable and very soft. It keeps me nice and warm! Perfect for this winter. Gonna buy it in Black!
Great quality and loved it
Thick material. Better than expected. Would buy again.

Beautiful khaki color, soft fleece, but heavy and comfy.  Perfect fit.  Ordered Med.  I'm 5'7", 135.  One small issue; one silver tip is missing from the hood string.  I've requested a replacement string for hood.  Fingers crossed.
I match even my dog’s boots.

评论概述: runs very small, not very cozy
评论详情: i normally wear a medium, i bought this in a large so that it would be more oversized... the large fits like a small. if i had sized up to a xl or xxl maybe i would have liked it.

评论概述: Had a tear in the sleeve and runs small

I went with the Medium so it would be roomy, but the pants are still quite fitted, especially at the waist. If I were to order again I would go up 2 sizes, at least, maybe 3 if I wanted a super oversized look.

评论详情: Color is a big dissatisfaction so I returned it

Best clothing I’ve purchased on Amazon. Great quality and fits true to size. Just purchased two more colors. Seems pricey but this set would be worth $100 at any brick and mortar retail shop. Worth it.
The high quality cotton blend looks and feels soft! So many compliments from men and women. Bought the same pattern from another buyer and it's not up to pare. I need every color!
Absolutely love the color and fit of this set. Thick and warm!! Great quality, and will definitely be getting more colors!
Color as expected. Oversized but not too baggy. I’m pleased!
Very comfortable and beautiful
Great set - high end quality!

Overall, the material was good. However, there was a flaw in the stitching, which caused a hole by my pocket. I would’ve thought for as much money as you spend on these the stitching would be correct.

Great quality for the price! The fabric is thick and the fit is so cute! I will be buying more colors!

I am so happy with this sweatsuit. It is fleecy, warm, comfortable, and looks amazing. It arrived 4 days earlier than expected. I was so glad because I wanted to take it away with me for the weekend. Love it.

I live in the gray set, i bought a size larger so that it’s more comfy. The gray set is well made, the material is thick and the black version is made of the same material has microfiber washcloths lol. I wear small and bought medium

Magnifique ensemble. Beau coton épais, très stylé et l couleur marine est magnifique! Le chandail couvre la taille , j’ai pris un Medium même normalement je suis Small et c’est parfait, je le voulais confortable.

So pretty hit and miss, but to their credit they gave me a full refund and made it quick and easy. And when it’s the right one it’s the best tracksuit!

Great price however you get what you pay for. Bought them for winter however got them at the end of winter so probably not going to wear them until next winter. Bought size S, the top is a good size the tracksuit bottom however, soooooooo big. My husband who wears a size XL, can fit into them. Just wondering if I can exchange it?

This product is described and shown as a CROP top. What I received is something entirely different. The hoodie is midway on my things- oversized! It’s also made of a cheap polyester. I sent an email to the seller over a week ago and it hasn’t been acknowledged. I am extremely disappointed. Do not buy!
I liked the sweatshirt set however someone was wearing this product before for sure. I found some hair in it and the ticket was added after. I would expect better attitude to the clients.
